item.title: When awareness feels like a burden
item.description: The worst days of my life happen to be the ones where I am overly aware about my surroundings and problems.

item.title: Why Brazilian Portuguese speakers struggle to understand European Portuguese
item.description: EP speakers lowkey be like: 'ixtou a apnhr murangjs pah'

item.title: Echoes of thought in a world wired to produce
item.description: For the first time in a few months, I had some time alone to process my thoughts.
